title: Stuck at 60fps?
body:
I constantly get 20-60 fps on low graphics or very high graphics. putting it on windowed mode low resolution doesnt help at all either. 
I have windows 10 home 64-bit, intel core i7-4720hq, 16384mb ram,
Also I have already turned off game dvr but no change has happened.
Please help

replies.body: You can try turning off vertical-sync. It works for me {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

There's a chance that those frames can't get any higher due to some weird driver or software interaction. Let's go through and double check all of that with the steps in our [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting). Make sure to test those changes in a custom or practice game!

Also, I've noticed that the game bar will be re-enabled after windows updates, and that they also changed up how you can disable it. Make sure to double check that the game bar wasn't turned back on!
